wikipedia_page.main: Albert Fairclough (4 October 1891 – 5 November 1958), sometimes known as Fairy Fairclough, was an English professional footballer who played as a centre forward in the Football League for Bristol City, Derby County, Southend United, Gillingham and Manchester City.

link_mentions.page: List of Derby County F.C. seasons

response: Fairclough was the younger brother of footballer Albert Fairclough. He served in the First World War.
